programme.title: Xp Guide
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 XP Guide Oslo 1, Norway
programme.desc: Oslo is the oldest of the Scandinavian capitals; with a rich history dating back to over 1000 years, the city’s iconic monuments reveal its evolution through the ages to visitors. Elisha goes on a tour to see some of them such as the magnificent Arkeshus Castle, a medieval castle that was built to protect Oslo but was used instead as a prison, and Oslo City Hall, the administrative center of the city which hosts the annual Nobel peace prize ceremony.

programme.title: Viajar Mexico
programme.desc: Tulum, one of the last cities built and inhabited by the Mayans; Charlie narrates the stories about their reign.

programme.title: World Heritage
programme.desc: Cyprus seduces travelers effortlessly with the charm of a sunny Mediterranean seaside country. When they explore more of it, though, they find the vividly painted Byzantine churches in the Troodos ranges, which reveal the Greek roots of Cyprus. The role it played in human evolution unfolds at the archaeological treasure troves of Khirokitia and Paphos. A tryst with the heritage of Cyprus unravels the stories of one of the oldest civilizations in the Mediterranean.

programme.desc: Red Bull re-invents a contest like no other at Europe’s most legendary skatepark – Marseille’s fabled Bowl du Prado. Bowl Rippers welcomes the planet’s top bowl skaters to France’s friendliest city.

programme.title: Red Bull Signature Series
programme.sub-title: S2018 : E05 Red Bull Crashed Ice – Edmonton
programme.desc: The 2018 season reaches its climax at the final stop in Edmonton. The brand new 455m track features one of the biggest jumps of the year, challenging the riders and thrilling the crowds.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Most people's nightmares are a dream come true for Jeb Corliss, a world-class BASE jumper whose surreal flights nearly end when he gets too close for comfort to South Africa's Table Top Mountain.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Dean's Blue Hole in the Bahamas is the world's deepest saltwater blue hole. It's also the backdrop for William Trubridge's record attempt to finless dive 300 feet below the surface in just one breath.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 Journey to inner earth
programme.desc: Dropping through towering shafts, Chris Jewell's team descends a mile into the earth to set the record for deepest cave dive in the Western Hemisphere at Mexico's Huautla Cave System.

programme.title: Castles in the Sky
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Castles in the Sky
programme.desc: Filmed in five countries over three years, Castles in the Sky delves into the heart of the locations while the surfers travel through them with a sense of open-minded awe.

programme.title: Red Bull Soapbox Race
programme.desc: To win or To(ulouse)? That is the question that will be answered today in this gravity-powered race! May the pink city give strength and courage to the many participants.

programme.title: Tunnel Pass
programme.desc: A lifetime project completed in 44 seconds. On September 4, 2021, Italian pilot Dario Costa attempted to fly his race plane at 303,8kph through Turkey’s dual Çatalca Tunnels.

programme.title: Shires
programme.desc: Filmed over two years and narrated by Rob Warner, Shires is a bicycle film encompassing everything that makes UK riding great – the riders, trails, landscapes and the volatile weather of the British isles.

programme.title: Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Jorge Prado: Under the Lights
programme.desc: 23-year-old Jorge Prado stands atop European motocross as reigning MXGP World Champion. Now he's chasing a lifelong dream and testing himself by racing Supercross under the bright lights in America.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: French duo Tancrède Melet and Julien Millot are masters of highlining. Untethered and thousands of metres above sea level, they BASE jump into the void, synthesizing a new sport they call BASE Lining.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Riders on the storm
programme.desc: Using sophisticated technology to hunt fearsome storms that create monster-sized swells, veteran surfers Ross Clarke-Jones and Tom Carroll set off for the unridden waves of Pedra Branca.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: A freak swell that creates a towering wave in Tahiti and a rare rolling cloud that looms dangerously in the skies above Australia are irresistible lures for athletes to confront these natural wonders.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Tapping into the "flow," a meditative state in which an athlete becomes one with his surroundings, Ben Brown battles life-threatening weather to lead a kayaking expedition across New Zealand.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Venturing to ascend the impressive Cerro Autana, climbers Leo Houlding, Jason Pickles and Sean Leary trek deep into the Amazon to discover why this summit has never been reached from the east.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: At least 16 expeditions have tried to summit the 8,000m peak called Gasherbrum II during the Pakistani winter. They all failed. Determined to beat the stats, Cory Richards documents his team's ascent.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: In their quest to be the first to summit Ulvetanna Peak in Antarctica, Leo Houlding, Jason Pickles and Sean Leary will need good weather and all their experience to best a frozen 2,931m challenge.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Darren Berrecloth leads a group of mountain bikers through the hostile terrain of Nepal's Upper Mustang and China's Gobi Desert, carrying their bikes to reach the world's most breathtaking descents.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Ice climber Harald Berger waits for one of Austria's most stunning waterfalls to freeze over. The Supervisor is a thousand-foot cascade of ice that he’s determined to conquer in a free solo ascent.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: In the Isterdalen Valley of Norway, BASE jumping enthusiasts Shane McConky, JT Holmes and Miles Daisher climb into state-of-the-art wingsuits to learn the art of proximity jumping from the best.

programme.title: Ultimate Rush
programme.desc: Behind the scenes, the filmmakers that capture the thrilling action sports feats of Ultimate Rush blend art, craft and technical skill with a physical courage that rivals the athletes themselves.

programme.title: Red Bull Signature Series
programme.desc: Red Bull Rampage is the premier freeride mountain biking event, known around the world as the proving ground for the bravest and most skilled riders.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The WPT Bellagio High Roller is down to the final table at HyperX Esports Arena - who will walk away with the $432,000 first-place prize? Watch and see the penultimate episode of this incredible final table with a luxury Hublot watch going to the winner.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Top pros and action-packed businessmen descend on Las Vegas for a high stakes cash game at HyperX Esports Arena. Watch the big cash game action with more than $400,000 on the table and big stars including Ben Lamb and Kristen Bicknell.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: More high stakes cash game action from HyperX Esports Arena with Ben Lamb and Randall Emmett running the show and $500,000 sitting on the table with a big game in Sin City. See who wins a luxury Hublot watch as biggest winner.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Big pots and bigger bluffs are taking place inside HyperX Esports Arena in Las Vegas. Don't miss the high stakes cash game with the best players in the world competing for bragging rights and cold hard cash with Randall Emmett and Kristen Bicknell in action.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The pots grow and the stakes get higher in Las Vegas for the WPT Vegas Cash Game. The pros battle against Hollywood's most dangerous inside HyperX Esports Arena.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Tune in for the finale to the WPT Vegas Cash Game in Las Vegas! Big pots, million dollars on the table, a Hublot watch up for grabs are all on the line in one of the largest televised cash games in poker history.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Six WPT Champions battle against two ClubWPT Challengers for $50,000 at HyperX Esports Arena. Watch to see Darren Elias and Scotty Nguyen battle in Las Vegas against Clubbies looking to knock off the pros.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The battle continues in Las Vegas between WPT Champions and ClubWPT qualifiers for $50,000 with Mike Sexton and Scotty Nguyen leading the charge for the pros. Watch the action from HyperX Esports Arena in Las Vegas.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: ClubWPT qualifiers battle WPT champions in Las Vegas and Scotty Nguyen is in the driver's seat versus two ClubWPT qualifiers looking to knock him down in Las Vegas at HyperX Esports Arena.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The battle between ClubWPT and WPT champions concludes at HyperX Esports Arena, watch the action conclude from Las Vegas with Scotty Nguyen looking to win the title and $50,000.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Chips, words, and chicken wings are flying at HyperX Esports Arena! Frank Stepuchin's antics are taking center stage in Las Vegas in the second episode of the WPT Gardens Poker Championship. See if Frank can hold onto his huge chip lead and claim the $548,000 first-place prize.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: $548,000 is up for grabs at HyperX Esports Arena and the pros are fighting to stay in contention versus wild card Frank Stepuchin (and his chicken wings). A luxurious Hublot watch and a seat to the Baccarat Crystal WPT Tournament of Champions are on the line in Las Vegas.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Shannon Shorr and Frank Stepuchin are heads up in Las Vegas for the first title of WPT season XVII. See if the pro can overcome the crazy amateur to win the $548,000 top prize and a seat to the Baccarat Crystal WPT Tournament of Champions.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The race for the $728,000 first-place prize continues as the third-largest field in WPT history is down to only five players. See who takes the next step toward putting their name on the WPT Champions Cup at HyperX Esports Arena.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: Play heats up in Las Vegas for the WPT Borgata Winter Poker Open final table with four players left to chase after the $728,000 first-place prize. Viny Lima and Dave Farah are battling for the chip lead and history to become the newest member of the WPT Champions Club.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The finale of the WPT Borgata Winter Poker Open is here! See who joins the WPT Champions Club as a field of 1,415 players is now down to only three. The final battle to win $728,000 is on the line at HyperX Esports Arena.

programme.title: World Poker Tour
programme.desc: The $10,000 WPT L.A. Poker Classic brings the stars to Las Vegas! Darren Elias headlines looking for his fifth career WPT title and standing in his way are WPT Champion Matas Cimbolas and seasoned pro David Baker. The $1 million first-place prize and a prize pool of more than $5 million are on the line in Las Vegas.

programme.sub-title: S08 : E23 World Poker Tour Season 8
programme.desc: This Hollywood Casino might not be in California but this WPT final table has plenty of star power and a storyline worthy of a Hollywood screenplay.
